sentence.Network_en: As an overseer, he suddenly found himself a person of consequence.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为工头，他突然觉得自己是个重要人物。

sentence.Network_en: I was put in the tailor shop, and I loved it. I was promoted to overseer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我被安排到缝纫车间，结果我很喜欢这项工作，后来还晋升为工头。

sentence.Network_en: When the overseer was not in, most of the workers would lie down on the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要监工不在, 大多数工人就磨洋工.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...episkopos”（επίσκοπος），即“epi 由上往下”及“skopos 观察者”，意为“监督”（overseer）。依据初期的传统，祝圣主教代表授予圣职圣事的圆满性。中文名主教外文名bishop所属宗教天主教，东正.
全战中的随从解析_罗马全面战争吧 ... 条件：基本，一级剧场 odeon 监工 overseer 讽刺作家 satirist.
87避难所的监督者（Overseer）和所有的居民被锁在密闭避难所里，并完全暴露在FEV1病毒之下，原本避难所的“计划”就是这样设计 …
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... oversee 向下看,了望,监督 overseer 监督,工头 overset 打翻,推翻,使失败.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also denoting a person appointed by a testator to assist the executor of a will): from oversee

entry.def: An overseer is someone whose job is to make sure that employees are working properly.

example.ex: I was put in the tailor shop, and I loved it. I was promoted to overseer.
example.tran: 我被安排到缝纫车间，结果我很喜欢这项工作，后来还晋升为工头。

entry.tran: （某一体系、活动等的）监督人，监管人，负责人
entry.def: If a person or organization is the overseer of a particular system or activity, they are responsible for making sure that the system or activity works properly and is successful.

example.ex: ...the department's dual role as overseer of oil production and safety.
example.tran: 该部门作为监管石油生产与安全的机构的双重身份

means.word_mean: 1. a person who directs and manages an organization

auth_sentence.content: The current overseer of Project Tiger, Gopal, refutes the critics.

auth_sentence.content: Rankin is the principal engineer and overseer of Brigham's wells in the Bakken.
